reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress chic and well-made, with a perfect length that hits above the knees and a comfortable, soft material that feels like a sweatshirt.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality sweater dress!
items.body: I received so many compliments while wearing this dress. I felt so comfy and stylish especially with how loose it feels. My favorite part is the sleeves that kind of bubble. The sweater material is very soft and weighted. Such a cute dress to wear with tall boots! Read more
items.author: Megan Yaptengco

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Look & feel amazing in this!!!
items.body: Oh! My! Gosh!!! Why didn’t I find this dress 2 months ago while we had cold weather??? This is sooooooo freaking cute I want to buy one in every color! I bought the XL black with black/tan stripes. I’m 5’4” and usually wear a 2x. The skirt comes to my knees and the sweater fits. It’s not oversized on me, and luckily not tight. The sweater material feels soft, heavy weight, and great quality. The skirt fabric is nice quality, mid weight, great coverage - can’t see through it. I added a long gold/large pink stone necklace and knee high boots with it, and I feel like an IG influencer (ROFL). In all seriousness, this is adorable, and I can’t wait to wear this out!!! It looks amazing and best of all, I FEEL AMAZING IN IT…and that’s how we should always feel in our clothes!!! xoxoxox Read more
items.author: Robin C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great work dress or even date night
items.body: I went with my usual size and it was perfect. Cute, and the sweater material is heavy. The length is great for everyday and also work. Read more
items.author: Jacqueline

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and cute
items.body: This dress is very cute. It's well made and it's a good price. The sweater part is thick and the skirt is thin. Very soft, very comfortable. Fits very well. Read more
items.author: Cook78

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cute but Beware - Laundry nightmare!
items.body: honestly, a really cute dress BUT the skirt bled black dye ALL over the entire load of laundry, ruining all clothes including the sweater of this dress NOT worth the price to have to replace all clothes. such a bummer. Read more
items.author: Samantha Sanborn

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but poor quality
items.body: Super cute. Shoulders were sewn on the wrong side. I’ll keep it and hope my hair hides it, or one day when I get adventurous pull out the sewing machine. Read more
items.author: amanda phillips

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute for Fall
items.body: I absolutely love this dress. I am 5'5 and it hits me just above my knee and is perfect for the fall. The material is not see through, comfortable, and thick. This dress is definitely oversized and doesn't hug the body, but that's exactly what I was looking for. Read more
items.author: Jessica

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Bad quality!!
items.body: I've washed it one time and there is already a huge hole in the sleeve!!! Read more
items.author: Ettinger

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Stripedapricot, Stripedgreen, Stripedblue, Whiteblack, Stripedwhite, Black, Coffee, Stripedbeige, Stripedblack. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
